meanings.sent1: I can reach the cookie jar on the top shelf.
meanings.sent2: She reached out her hand to grab the book.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to reach the toy dangling from the string.
meanings.sent4: His influence can reach far and wide in the community.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches reach towards the sky in search of sunlight.

meanings.definition: To arrive at or come to
meanings.sent1: We will reach the park in ten minutes.
meanings.sent2: The train will reach the station on time.
meanings.sent3: The pizza delivery guy will reach our house soon.
meanings.sent4: The message finally reached her after a long delay.
meanings.sent5: The sun will reach the horizon at sunset.

meanings.definition: The extent or range of something
meanings.sent1: The bird's wingspan is beyond the reach of most other birds.
meanings.sent2: The reach of the river extends for miles.
meanings.sent3: The reach of the internet allows us to connect globally.
meanings.sent4: The reach of the telescope can see distant galaxies.
meanings.sent5: The reach of the tree's shadow grew longer as the sun set.

meanings.definition: The act of stretching or extending
meanings.sent1: His reach was not long enough to grab the ball.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's graceful reach impressed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful reach towards the yarn amused us.
meanings.sent4: The painter's reach for the high corner required a ladder.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's reach for the finish line was a photo finish.

meanings.sent1: With hard work, you can reach your goals.
meanings.sent2: She reached the top of the mountain after a long climb.
meanings.sent3: The team will reach victory with determination.
meanings.sent4: He reached success through dedication and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The student will reach academic excellence with effort and focus.
